title: Generous Social Support System
description: In 2022, Belgium allocated 84.99% of its expenses to subsidies and other transfers, indicating a robust social support system.

title: High Density of Healthcare Professionals
description: With 20.89 nurses and midwives per 1,000 people in 2022, Belgium boasts one of the highest densities of healthcare professionals globally.

title: Low Prevalence of Child Malnutrition
description: In 2023, only 0.2% of Belgian children under five were underweight, showcasing effective nutritional policies.

title: Minimal Child Wasting Rates
description: Belgium recorded a mere 0.2% prevalence of wasting among male children under five in 2023, reflecting excellent child health standards.

title: Low Early Marriage Rates
description: As of 2020, only 0.1% of Belgian women aged 20-24 were married by age 18, indicating progressive societal norms.
